entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Kamloops
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:37 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kamloops Airport 11:10 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 2.5°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 7:38 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning except a few flurries over higher terrain. Snow level 600 metres. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:38 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 30 percent chance of showers before morning except a few flurries over higher terrain. Snow level near valley bottom. Fog patches developing after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 7:38 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
